      protected void populateSearch(java.lang.String titleKeyword, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ingredients)
      This method is called when a search is done, it creates an async task, as well as defining a DataDownloadListener which is a type that will pass the data from the async task back to setSearch method.
      protected void setListViewOnClickListener(ListView listView, java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> recipes)

      void setSearch(java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> recipes)

      Will show a dialog says the input is invalid

      • setListViewOnClickListener

        protected void setListViewOnClickListener(ListView listView,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> recipes)
        Takes in a listview, and an array of recipes to bind to an onItemClickListener These variables must be passed in as final so that the listener declared inside may access them.
        Parameters:
        listView - listview to bind to recipes param
        recipes - list of recipes to bind to given listview

      • addIngredient

        protected void addIngredient(View v)
        This will show a dialog for user to input a ingredient and save it to the pantry. If the input is null, it will call the showInvalidInputWaring() to show warn the user.
        Parameters:
        v -

      • showInvalidInputWaring

        protected void showInvalidInputWaring()
        Will show a dialog says the input is invalid

      • populateSearch

        protected void populateSearch(java.lang.String titleKeyword,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ingredients)
        This method is called when a search is done, it creates an async task, as well as defining a DataDownloadListener which is a type that will pass the data from the async task back to setSearch method.

      • setSearch

        public void setSearch(java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> recipes)
        * @author Torboto This method is called by the async task once it has completed it's call from the server.
        Parameters:
        recipes - receives list of recipes that matched the search
